snippet: Jimmie Johnson led 255 of 334 laps for a dominating victory at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth, putting him back in the Chase for the Sprint Cup lead.
abstract: Jimmie Johnson captures dominating victory at Texas Motor Speedway in Forth Worth, putting him back in the Chase for the Sprint Cup lead with two races left in Nascar season.
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson led 255 of 334 laps for a dominating victory at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth, putting him back in the Chase for the Sprint Cup lead.
